Name: Bolero Sour
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into an ice-filled glass.
Review: A beautifully balanced, flavoursome medley of sweet and sour.
History: Adapted from David A. Embury's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Bolero Sour contains 174 calories
